title: Shivam Pandey
text:
Welcome to my site! I’m Shivam Pandey, a tech explorer dedicated to advancing AI’s explainability and its ability to generalize across tasks with minimal data.


Scaling computes, not comprehension.

Even massive compute and oceans of data only deliver brute-force wins—they scale performance, not true insight. These systems remain data inefficient and fail to generalize, missing the mark on real intelligence.
